questions.quote: Because... look, no one wants this to happen more than me, ok? I have gone over this moment in my head a hundred times and not once did I ever say no! I couldn't do it to Ross!
I am sorry I am late. You'll understand when you'll see Joey.
Oh wow, I hope you don't take this the wrong way but, I know we had plans to meet up tonight and, ugh, I'm just kinda worried about what it might do to our friendship.
Okay, okay, I'm sorry, it will never happen... Uh-oh! Wait a minute! Wait-wait, now there are a hundred of you and I'm the king.
Ah yes, but he's very protective of me so you'd better watch yourself.
All right look, if you're not gonna stay for me, then at least stay for them! Okay, they have had a very difficult year! What with the robbery and all!
I'm sorry, I was just thinking you're day could still pick up.
Hey guys! You found the presents? Chandler, you let them find the presents? Great! Do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier?
Thanks. Great so we can all go together! I gotta run. Catch you later!
Ross, we can solve this. I just heard your speech. We can recreate it! We've got all night!
